ratings.question_text: I would give the instructor of this class an overall rating of:
I would give this course an overall rating of:
Did you participate in a work group as part of this course?

narratives.question_text: What is the name of your TA?
comments: Julia Lisztwan
Julia Lisztwan
Julia

narratives.question_text: Use the space below to comment on questions 1-10, if you wish
comments: This is an excellent class w. an amazing instructor. Highly recommend.
Hands-on learning, and a great instructor.
Experience a real relationship with a customer and practice negotiation techniques.

narratives.question_text: The things about this course most in need of improvement are:
comments: n/a
Allow a more time to prepare for the advocacy trial/moot court.

narratives.question_text: What was the availability and quality of help you received of the instructor and TA?
comments: Both were very responsive and great to work with.
We had a few group meetings with the instructors that was very helpful and just enough.

narratives.question_text: Discuss if you wish how this course fits into your overall program.
comments: It was a great fit.

It greatly depends on the project you choose. Luckily, I had just the right project offered this semester to fit my interest in transboundary river organizations. My advice, go to the first class and see what projects are offered.

narratives.question_text: Why did you take this course?
comments: It sounded fun and interesting.

I wanted to familiarize myself with environmental law. Although I worked on a great project and didn't need to use any law knowledge, this is not the course to take if you have no background in law at all.

narratives.question_text: Did it live up to your expectations?
comments: The quality of this class largely depends on your luck of the draw when choosing a project. Our project was less than stellar, but still a good learning experience.
Absolutely. I loved the course.
Yes. I enjoyed my project team and the experience with the client. I learned something about rivers, organizations and environmental law.

narratives.question_text: Did you get out of it what you expected?
comments: Yes, all I expected and more. It was great.

narratives.question_text: If yes, what were the advantages and disadvantages of the group work?
comments: It was a great project, and I enjoyed the group and learned a lot from working with them.
I believe that our professional life includes team work and any additional experience in working with people is good although sometimes it is challenging.

narratives.question_text: For students taking this course, what advice would you give them?
comments: Go to the first class and see what projects are offered. If they interest you, take the course. You will also enjoy other activities during the semester in class but most of the time you will invest in the project.
